data.title: First participation of Taniyama Kishou & Asanuma Shintarou & Satou Takuya! “Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi in SUMMER!!!!” has been announced
data.text:
“Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi in SUMMER!!!! ~Isshou Wasurerarenai Natsu ni Shiteyaruyo SP~ (Voice Actor’s Pajama Meeting in summer!! ~We’ll make it an unforgettable Summer Special Program~)” will be broadcast exclusively on “ABEMA”, at 9:00 PM, September 4, 2021. Yasumoto Hiroki and Aoi Shouta are the main MC while the guests are Namikawa Daisuke, Morikubo Showtaro, Taniyama Kishou, Asanuma Shintarou, Satou Takuya, and Shimazaki Nobunaga.

“Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi” is the industry largest voice actor variety program that was born from the idea of “Helping you to enjoy your time during this stay home situation via ‘ABEMA'”. It was first broadcast in May 2020 as part of “Ouchi de ABEMA (At home with ABEMA)”, and the 2nd broadcast, titled “Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi in WINTER” was broadcast in November 2020, and it is a popular program that has even ranked in as the 1st place in Twitter’s world trend.

The exclusive live stream of “Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi in SUMMER!! ~Isshou Wasurerarenai Natsu ni Shiteyaruyo SP~” will have Yasumoto Hiroki and Aoi Shouta continuing their role as the main MC from the previous broadcast. The guests for this broadcast are Namikawa Daisuke, Morikubo Showtaro, and Shimazaki Nobunaga along with the first-timers, which are Taniyama Kishou, Asanuma Shintarou, and Satou Takuya. This broadcast will feature various variety programs and conversation with the 8 popular voice actors in “Pajamas”.

Also, the “2-jikai (After-party)” program, which was also popular during the previous broadcast, has been decided as well. The “2-jikai” program, titled “Pajama wo Nuide ○○ ni Naru 2-jikai ~Honpen Chokugou! Zenin Honki no PPV again~ (The ○○ after-party after taking off the Pajama ~Right after the main program! The second all-out PPV~)” will be broadcast live at 11:15 PM, on “ABEMA PPV ONLINE LIVE”. It will feature a deeper corner that can’t be seen on the main program, and it only costs 1,050 ABEMA Coins (equivalent to approximately 1,250 JPY) to watch it.

To commemorate the broadcast of this program, the “5 Big Campaign” is being held, and it will give out more gorgeous program limited novelties and original goods. The campaign includes free watching of “Pajama wo Nuide ○○ ni Naru 2-jikai ~Honpen Chokugou! Zenin Honki no PPV Again~” for “ABEMA Premium”, and a lottery where 158 people can get the program original goods, including “Soft & Fluffy Blanket” and “Aurora Pouch”. An original digital photobook of all the performers will be given to those who purchased the “2-jikai” program.

Other than this, the digest version of “Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi in WINTER” has been released for the first time, with other contents that will help hype up “Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi in SUMMER!!!!”. Do look forward to the future announcements while waiting for the broadcast.

“Seiyuu Pajama Kaigi in SUMMER!!!! ~Isshou Wasurerarenai Natsu ni Shiteyaruyo SP~”

＜Broadcast Period & Program Webpage＞

Broadcast Period: 9:00 PM – 11:15 PM, September 4, 2021 (Saturday)

Broadcast Channel: Anime Live Channel

※After the broadcast, it can be watched for free until 11:59 PM, September 12, 2021 (Sunday)

Performers (Honorifics omitted):

＜Main MC＞

Yasumoto Hiroki, Aoi Shouta

＜Guest (Not according to alphabet)＞

Namikawa Daisuke, Morikubo Showtaro, Taniyama Kishou, Asanuma Shintarou, Satou Takuya, Shimazaki Nobunaga

“ABEMA PPV ONLINE LIVE”/ “Pajama wo Nuide ○○ ni Naru 2-jikai ~Honpen Chokugou! Zenin Honki no PPV Again~”

Broadcast Period: 11:15 PM, September 4, 2021 (Saturday) – 12:00 AM, September 5, 2021 (Sunday)

Streaming Charge:

Regular Ticket: 1,050 ABEMA Coins (Approximately 1,250 JPY)

GOTO Event Applicable Ticket: 840 ABEMA Coins (Approximately 1,000 JPY)

Sales Period: 6:00 PM, August 23, 2021 (Monday) – 9:00 PM, September 12, 2021 (Sunday)

Viewing Period: 11:15 PM, September 4, 2021 (Saturday) – 11:59 PM, September 12, 2021 (Sunday)

Performers (Honorifics omitted and not according to alphabet)

Main MC: Yasumoto Hiroki, Aoi Shouta

Namikawa Daisuke, Morikubo Showtaro, Taniyama Kishou, Asanuma Shintarou, Satou Takuya, Shimazaki Nobunaga
